Name: Excaliboo
Desc: Only a sacred sword is needed to crown the true king.

1.Name: Sacred Sword Unleashed
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Excaliboo attempts to draw the sword:
If the attempt fails, it performs a triple hammer strike, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If successful, it slashes the target with the sword, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

2.Name: Sacred Sword Unleashed
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Excaliboo attempts to draw the sword:
If the attempt fails, it performs a triple hammer strike, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If successful, it slashes the target with the sword, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

1.Name: Victor's Oath
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there's at least 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</color> character in your squad: Upon using an <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>, the sword draw is guaranteed to succeed, and DMG increases by 30%.

2.Name: Victor's Oath
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there's at least 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</color> character in your squad: Upon using an <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>, the sword draw is guaranteed to succeed, and DMG increases by 37.5%.

5.Name: Victor's Oath

1.Name: King's Unstoppable Might
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Strike forward with the sacred sword, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> to enemies in front.
